fucking shit game full of hackers

A game that's easy to pick up and hard to master. A true competitive shooter's candy. Just beware of scammers and other terrible people. Game is prone to have it's toxic people, but the mute option is handy and for streamers there is a safe mode that allows you to "correct" names to keep them in TOS.

Great game but rank system is so fucked up im MGE and i had 35 points and we lost 16-5 and one on my team had 9 and another one had 15 FIX IT! The m4a4 spraypaddern is weird. The sg spraypaddern is so unbelievable big. I like the meaning of the game and overall a great game
good game overall with good game mechanics but instead of new skins valve should focus a little more on the VAC bans and there anti cheat, along with the ranking system which is broken to hell

This game gave me terminal cancer, I can also speak fluent Russian right now and I have learned one thing, no matter how good you are, the opponent is fucking hacker.

I highly recommend you play this game if you want absolute misery and depression.

I really enjoy this, game, as you can see by my hours i have played this game loads, if it counted my hours offline i would have probably about a thousand, i think there is honestly a lot of replay-ability in this game, finding new people to play with and see what they bring to the table in a comp match.
Very nice action game. Thanks Valve for this game.
Its a really good game, exept its kinda ruined cuz of all the cheaters. It was definitely fun to play it while it didnt have as much cheaters as now
